column5: Please read the entire listing before submitting a review, this is a place to crash, you will not have a bed, you will have a couch (not a sleeper) and/or air mattress. I will provide the basics, this is how I keep the listing cost low. I also have a cat, if you have allergies, this is not the place for you.  Oak Cliff has been named the \
column8: Oak Cliff Crash Pad- Women Only
